children.name: Rules
children.text: This enchanted shortbow is carved from black wood to look like two serpents striking with a string between them. It is a +1 shortbow that deals an extra 1d4 poison damage on a successful hit. Once per day the bow can be used to fire an arrow that turns into a serpent as it strikes the target. This command is uttered as part of the attack made with the bow, but before the roll is determined. If the hit succeeds the poison damage is increased to 2d6, and the target must make a DC12 constitution save or be poisoned for 1 minute and have their speed be reduced to half, if they are medium or smaller as the serpent attempts to coil around them. After a minute the summoned serpent vanishes.
